title: Chasing Trista
description: Bravo Team Leader, Erik “Falcon” Lamont, takes his job with W.J. very seriously. With a giant chip on his shoulder, no one stands a chance of getting close. No one except the woman who is hurricane Trista that is. He will do anything to avoid her. So when Trista suddenly disappears with knowledge about their latest assignment, he is forced to chase her down. His friends call him Falcon. Relentless in stalking his prey. Nothing will stop Falcon from finding Trista.Trista St. Clair never backs down from a challenge and Falcon might be her biggest one yet. When one simple picture turns Trista’s life upside down. She will stop at nothing to discover the truth that changed her life. Even if it means further angering the one man she can’t stop thinking about. Trista will learn to expect the unexpected.When sparks fly, can they put their differences aside and finally put the end to King’s operation once and for all?Chasing Trista is the second book in the Bravo Team series. While Falcon and Trista’s love story is only represented in this book, a subplot continues from previous books and should be read in order.
author: Elizabella Baker
